text: A Chieftan is a mighty warrior who gained leadership of a whole clan or tribe. In war, they serve as officers of a Overking. New Overkings usually emerge from the ranks of the mightiest Petty Chieftains.

Druidic Priests have walked the Path of the Truthsayers, but either failed or left this path on their own. Despite only being able to cast simpler spells, they are still highly valued and often employed by chieftains as their personal advisors.

Druidic Priests have walked the Path of the Truthsayers, but either failed or left this path on their own. Despite only being able to cast simpler spells, they are still highly valued and often employed by chieftains as their personal advisors.

Overkings are the strongest and fiercest warriors of Albion. They usually have command over the warbands of several tribes and clans and will be called upon whenever the people of Albion have to wage war on a larger scale.
